channel.title: Others on Danislu
channel.description: Recent content in Others on Danislu

item.title: Welcome to my new website
item.description: Welcome I’m very happy to introduce my new website! It’s a static website that I have done in less than 3 hours with this Hugo tutorial function func() = list.map((item) = item.stuff); from pygments.styles import get_all_styles styles = list(get_all_styles()) print styles
